definition: The term "zeitaufwendig" refers to a characteristic of a task or activity that requires a significant amount of time and effort to complete. It is commonly used to describe activities that are time-consuming or labor-intensive, often implying that they may be burdensome or demanding in terms of time investment.

examples.german: Die Vorbereitung des Projekts war sehr zeitaufwendig.
examples.english: The preparation of the project was very time-consuming.

examples.german: Das Schreiben des Buches war ein zeitaufwendiger Prozess.
examples.english: Writing the book was a time-consuming process.

examples.german: Die Reparatur des Autos war zeitaufwendig, aber es hat sich gelohnt.
examples.english: The car repair was time-consuming, but it was worth it.

examples.german: Das Erlernen einer neuen Sprache kann zeitaufwendig sein.
examples.english: Learning a new language can be time-consuming.
